name: Breakout Birdie Adventure
description:
Breakout Birdie Adventure is a block-breaking game with a twist! Take aim at numerous block types and avoid the bevy of mines, spikes, cannons, and flying and diving bug and bird bosses! Hit bombs to blast your way through walls and activate switches to open up new areas as you attempt to bash all the blocks in each level! Catch golden power-ups to temporarily improve your birdie's abilities, but avoid red power-ups or risk finding yourself flying blind!


GAMEPLAY
Tap the flap buttons to make the birdie ball fly left or right. Avoid enemies and hazards while bashing blocks, detonating bombs, and hitting switches! Catch falling power-ups to gain extra hearts and special abilities such as temporary invincibility! Once you’ve bashed sufficient blocks, dive into the portal to complete the level!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.


FEATURES
* Another hilarious block-bashing birdie bonanza!
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* Over a dozen different block types!
* Cool power-ups to enhance your abilities!
* 48 unique levels to unlock and master!
* Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
* Bright and bubbly background tunes!
* Intuitive touch-screen controls!
* Suitable for players of all ages!
